post.title: AI Used In Vogue Ad Sparks Backlash
post.excerpt: The fashion industry is increasingly adopting artificial intelligence to create models and advertisements, due to cost-saving and efficiency. The recent use of an AI-generated model in Vogue's advertising has created backlash from fashion professionals concerned about job security and authenticity. There goes a lot of fashion jobs. https://techcrunch.com/?p=3033447
